lines.text: Calculate displacement using velocity, prior displacement
Calculate velocity using prior velocity, acceleration

secText:
Lesson:
1. Define [OBJ:expsec_m367:acceleration] in simple harmonic motion and determine the acceleration of an object in simple harmonic motion.
2. Define [OBJ:expsec_m368:velocity] in simple harmonic motion and identify the velocity of an object in simple harmonic motion.
3. Work through a sample problem to [OBJ:app_identify_acc_force_shm_question:identify the velocity, force, and acceleration] of an object in simple harmonic motion.
4. [OBJ:expsec_m371:Model] simple harmonic motion using spreadsheets.
